official_title: Feasibility of Exercise Prehabilitation Among Older Patients With Hepatobiliary Cancer Planning for Surgery
inclusion_criteria:
* Age ≥65 years
* Resectable Hepatocellular carcinoma, Cholangiocarcinoma, or Liver metastasis with Liver resection planned ≥4 weeks
* ECOG 0-2
* Able to sign consent
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 65 Years
